EReXIQ-6K2g.description:
Perplexity AI is answer engine that uses large language models to deliver accurate answers to complex questions. Perplexity is on a mission to redefine how you get accurate and reliable answers whenever you’re searching for information.

In this comprehensive Perplexity Pro tutorial, I’m going to show you everything you need to know to use this AI tool.

There is so much to cover in this masterclass and review of Perplexity, including Perplexity AI vs ChatGPT vs Google. 

Link to prompting tips created by Perplexity: 
https://blog.perplexity.ai/faq/prompting-tips-and-examples-on-perplexity
